pr_title: [GEOT-6703] Dwithin old syntax no longer supported

timeline.message: [GEOT-6703] Dwithin old syntax no longer supported
[GEOT-6703] Dwithin old syntax no longer supported

timeline.bodyText: The DistanceUnits constructor has been relaxed allowing null units.
timeline.author: alemarte

replies.author: aaime

timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: Actually, I copy paste from the definition. Is there a tool to automate the process?
replies.author: alemarte

replies.bodyText: There is but only useful to get started. When you copy/paste, mind what you're copying. If not generated, the annotation should be removed.
replies.author: aaime
